title: Malayan rubber
creator_credit: Educational Foundation for Visual Aids, Malayan Enterprise and World Wide Pictures
brief_description: Growing of rubber in Malaya. This film, after an introductory historical sequence showing the establishment of rubber plantations, shows the salient features of life and work on a rubber plantation in Malaya.
creator_credit_for_label: Educational Foundation for Visual Aids, Malayan Enterprise and World Wide Pictures
